statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.Name) as RowNo , BB.ID , BB.CreatedOn , BB.CreatedBy , BB.CreatedByName , BB.UpdatedOn , BB.UpdatedBy , BB.UpdatedByName
, AA.SiteID as SiteID , AA.ID as ScrapCategoryID , BB.SmapsCategoryID as SmapsCategoryID
, AA.Name as ScrapCategoryName , CC.name as SmapsCategoryName
FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapCategory AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TScrapCategoryToSmaps BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = BB.ScrapCategoryID LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsCategory CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON BB.SmapsCategoryID = CC.ID WHERE AA.SiteID = #SiteID#
AND BB.SmapsCategoryID IS NOT NULL
AND BB.SmapsCategoryID IS NULL
AND ( AA.Name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' OR CC.name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapCategoryToSmaps WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ID = #ID#
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapCategoryToSmaps WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ScrapCategoryID = #ScrapCategoryID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TScrapCategoryToSmaps ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ScrapCategoryID, SmapsCategoryID ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ScrapCategoryID#, #SmapsCategoryID# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE IKScrap.dbo.TScrapCategoryToSmaps SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ScrapCategoryID = #ScrapCategoryID# , SmapsCategoryID = #SmapsCategoryID# WHERE ID = #ID#
